article_title: Thousands of Lancaster residents had to repay excess healthcare.gov subsidies
article_text: Heather Stauffer covers the health care industry. She can be reached at hstauffer@lnpnews.com or 717-481-6022.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , affordable care act, individual mandate, healthcare.gov
article_metadata.author: HEATHER STAUFFER | Staff Writer

og.description: “Almost two-thirds of tax filers who received insurance via the state or federal insurance marketplaces had to pay back an average of $729,” said H&R Block, the nation’s largest consumer
